title: Beauty and Her Boss
description: An innocent beauty, a scarred hero…Could she be the one to open up his heart?Handsome but guarded former Hollywood star Deacon Santoro prefers the confines of his mansion since an accident left him scarred both inside and out. But he promised to protect sparky beauty Gabrielle Dupré, his new PA. Can Gabrielle convince Deacon that love will give them the fairy-tale ending they deserve?
author: Jennifer Faye
